Wisdom: النَّجَاةُ مَعَ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: Salvation comes with faith

Wisdom: بِالْإِيمَانِ تَكُونُ النَّجَاةُ
enWisdom: It is through faith that salvation is attained

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْإِيمَانِ الْفَوْزُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The fruit of faith is success with Allah

Wisdom: مِلَاكُ النَّجَاةِ لُزُومُ الْإِيمَانِ وَصِدْقُ الْإِيقَانِ
enWisdom: The basis of salvation is espousing faith and [having] true certitude

Wisdom: نَجَا مَنْ صَدَقَ إِيمَانُهُ وَهُدِيَ مَنْ حَسُنَ إِسْلَامُهُ
enWisdom: One whose faith is true is saved, and one whose submission is complete is guided

Wisdom: لَا يَفُوزُ بِالنَّجَاةِ إِلَّا مَنْ قَامَ بِشَرَائِطِ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: None is successful in attaining salvation but the one who fulfils the requirements of faith

Wisdom: بِالْإِيمَانِ يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى الصَّالِحَاتِ -
enWisdom: It is through faith that one is guided towards virtuous actions

Wisdom: بِالْإِيمَانِ يُرْتَقَى إَلَى ذِرْوَةِ السَّعَادَةِ وَنِهَايَةِ الْحُبُورِ
enWisdom: It is through faith that one reaches the pinnacle of felicity and the zenith of happiness

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْإِيمَانِ الرَّغْبَةُ فِي دَارِ الْبَقَاءِ
enWisdom: The fruit of faith is desire for the Eternal Abode

Wisdom: حَيَاءُ الرَّجُلِ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ ثَمَرَةُ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: The shame of person feels from himself is the fruit of [his] faith

Wisdom: خَفْضُ الصَّوْتِ وَغَضُّ الْبَصَرِ وَمَشْيُ الْقَصْدِ مِنْ أَمَارَةِ الْإِيمَانِ وَحُسْنِ التَّدَيُّنِ
enWisdom: Lowering your voice, casting down your gaze and walking with modesty are from the signs of faith and religiousness

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي الْإِيمَانِ وَوَصْفِهِ زُلْفَى لِمَنْ ارْتَقَبَ وَثِقَةٌ لِمَنْ تَوَكَّلَ وَرَاحَةٌ لِمَنْ فَوَّضَ وَجُنَّةٌ لِمَنْ صَبَرَ
enWisdom: He (‘a) said about faith: It is nearness [to Allah] for the one who guards [against evil], confidence for the one who trusts [in Allah], comfort for the one who entrusts [his affairs to Allah] and a shield for the one who endures patiently

Wisdom: غَيْرَةُ الرَّجُلِ إِيمَانٌ
enWisdom: A man’s sense of honour is faith

Wisdom: فَرَضَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْإِيمَانَ تَطْهِيراً مِنَ الشِّرْكِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has prescribed faith as a purification from doubt

Wisdom: غَايَةُ الْإِيمَانِ الْمُوَالاةُ فِي اللَّهِ وَالْمُعَادَاةُ فِي اللَّهِ وَالتَّبَادُلُ فِي اللَّهِ وَالتَّوَاصُلُ فِي اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The highest degree of faith is befriending for the sake of Allah, having enmity for the sake of Allah, spending on each other for the sake of Allah and establishing ties with each other for the sake of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: مَنْ يُؤْمِنْ يَزْدَدْ يَقِيناً
enWisdom: One who believes increases his certitude

Wisdom: مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ لَجَأَ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: One who believes in Allah seeks [help and] protection from Him

Wisdom: هُدِيَ مَنْ أَخْلَصَ إِيمَانَهُ
enWisdom: One who purifies his faith is guided

Wisdom: لَا يَصْدُقُ إِيمَانُ عَبْدٍ حَتَّى يَكُونَ بِمَا فِي يَدِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَوْثَقَ مِنْهُ بِمَا فِي يَدِهِ
enWisdom: The faith of a servant is not true until he is more confident of what is in the Hand of Allah, the Glorified, than what is in his own hand

Wisdom: آفَةُ الْإِيمَانِ الشِّرْكُ
enWisdom: The bane of faith is ascribing partners to Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ لَا إِيمَانَ لَهُ لَا أَمَانَةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: One who has no faith has no trustworthiness

Wisdom: لَا يَنْفَعُ الْإِيمَانُ بِغَيْرِ تَقْوَى
enWisdom: Faith without piety is of no benefit
